Modules¶

API¶

Send requests to Mailgun and handle responses.

pyholster.api.set_key(key)[source]¶

Set the API key to use.

pyholster.api.get(url, params={})[source]¶

Send a GET request.

pyholster.api.post(url, data, files=None)[source]¶

Send a POST request.

pyholster.api.put(url, data)[source]¶

Send a PUT request.

pyholster.api.delete(url)[source]¶

Send a DELETE request.
